title: Zach Top Wins Grammy for Old-Style Country Music
summary: Zach Top is a country music singer who just won his first Grammy Award. He won in a new category called best traditional country album for his album Ain't In It For My Health. This award celebrates old-fashioned country music. Zach Top grew up in Washington state and started playing music with his family when he was seven years old. He loves old country songs and makes music that sounds like them. He says winning the Grammy feels like a dream and he is happy that people like his music. Many young people come to his shows because they enjoy his traditional style. He thinks it is good that the Grammy now has a special award for traditional country, so artists like him can be recognized. Zach Top has over six million listeners on Spotify and is bringing old-school country to new fans.

background_read: Country music is a type of music that started in the United States, often with songs about life, love, and nature. Traditional country music uses instruments like guitars and fiddles and has a simple, heartfelt sound. The Grammy Awards are big prizes given every year to musicians for their best work. Zach Top is a new singer who makes old-style country music, and he won a Grammy to show that people still enjoy this kind of music. This helps introduce traditional songs to kids and teens who might not have heard them before.
